entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:16 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 09:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -17.7°C
Wind: NW 14 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
